resources.string: Need help? Send us a message
End date can\'t be less than today!
Payment will be charged to your account at confirmation of purchase.
Your subscription will renew automatically and charge you again, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the current period ends.
You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Apple ID Account Settings any time after purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription of Linked Wallet.
All new subscribers will have 7-day Free Trial.
When trial ends, you will be charged with your selected Plan.
The price depends on your country & currency. Please check it carefully before subscribing.
You can cancel anytime (before trial expires) if you do not want to convert to paid subscription.
If you\'re not using it, please cancel before the Renewal Date to avoid being charged.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription of Money Insider.
Text not available from Play Store. You can retry in a few minutes

Special thanks to
 Andreas Krings, Jake Wharton, Jeremy Feinstein, Roman Nurik, Simon Vig Therkildsen, Soarcn, Tjerk Wolterink for their awesome libraries.
 Brankic1979 and Nick Frost for their beautiful icon packs.
 And all our volunteers who help us on translating Money Lover to many other languages.
Freeze this wallet and stop generating bills & recurring transactions.
Do you want to delete wallet %1$s?
You can pick people from your contact by allowing Money Lover to access your contact on this device.
This debt has been fully paid
Your account %1$s was locked. Please contact the bank to unlock it.
Action failed. Please try again later.
Switch to activate or deactivate category in this wallet
This category belongs to %1$s. Please click Activate to enable %1$s before activating this category.
Tap to pay off other debt
Tap to receive other debt collection
Wallet name must be between %1$s and %2$s characters.
Please select one currency for your wallet
Add income to view the expense-to-income ratio.
Add your payment for last statement balance.
Inputted amount must be equal or smaller than unpaid amount. Unpaid amount is %1$s.
Do you still want to process?
Currency of input amount will be changed from
You must select category of spending/earning
You don\'t have any wallets. Please add one before adding a transaction.
You\'re about to add a transaction into a nonexistent wallet which may was deleted or you don\'t have permission to access it. Please select another wallet.
Please fill in all required fields
Free: Only 1 Wallet\nUpgrade Premium to create other Wallets and unlock more features, prepare for yourself to step up your finance
A new %1$s %2$s transaction will be created to adjust this wallet\'s balance
Enter current balance of this wallet
Analyze deeply your spending behavior in each periods.
Forecast your future spending & Give deeply recommendation for each cent.
You take a photo of something
So you can add transaction about it later
You can show this notification again in Settings
so you can add transaction later
Do you have any transactions today? Record them to better manage your expenses.
Reminds you to record your expense and income transactions every evening.
Take control of your finances with smart budgeting, expense tracking, and personalized insights.
Automatically categorize your spending and see where your money goes in real-time.
Set personalized budgets and get alerts when you\'re close to your limits.
Start your journey to financial freedom. Create your main wallet and begin tracking today.
Expense Tracker helps you to keep track of spending money from wallets. Each wallet represents a source of money such as Cash or a Bank Account.
Please create your main wallet to get started
No transactions to display. Please add some.
Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
You will soon be able to view transactions for each wallet here.
Get notified when there are changes to this wallet\'s transactions.
Ignore this wallet and its balance in the Total mode.
Failed to load wallet to edit
These transactions will be excluded from report in both wallets
Please select both source and destination wallets
Cannot transfer to the same wallet
Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
Failed to prepare image for sharing
Function not supported in this screen
Please enter an amount greater than zero
All children categories of the %1$s will be transferred to %2$s
All children categories of the %1$s will be transferred to parent category %2$s
Can not transfer amount exceed spending limit you set.
Oops, you can’t save this new transaction. Please upgrade to add unlimited transactions.
If you keep editing, the photo may be lost.
All transactions of the %1$s will be transferred to %2$s
This amount cannot be beyond available credit

We are upgrading Money Lover into new version and migrating your data from the old one to the new one. During the process, you may experience some losses of data, sometimes, unfortunately, all of them.\nTechnically, your data is still there as we will not delete them if the migrate process goes wrong.\nIf you find yourself into this situation, please contact us and we will help you find your data back.
It is better to create MoneyLover account with Share My Email option, so that we can easily contact you in case of issues.
We\'ll never post without your permission.
Budget is good but Budget Plus is awesome!
Some features are limited in your Free Plan.
Export your transactions to Excel or CSV file.
Fully control your money with unlimited wallets, budgets, savings and more across your devices. Premium features do not include Linked Wallet Subscription.
It\'s the best deal for you
Do you want to delete this bill only or delete all scheduled bills?
Congratulations!\nYou paid all bills this period.
Tap %1$s button above to add new bill
You have one %1$s bill due in %2$s.
You have one %1$s bill due today.
Not enough money to pay for bill on this day. You need %1$s
Reminder must occur before next repeat
Do you want to delete this bill ?
Bills feature is only available in Basic Wallet
You\'re Money Lover Free, so you can keep 1 wallet only. To keep more, please buy Money Lover Premium.
Boost your Saving Rate & Make your financial dreams come true.
Over 1 million users have improved their lives by being stress-free with Budget Plus for the price of a cup of coffee per month. Be a part of it!

To help you have a healthy and sustainable personal finance, we have done a lot of work to build and develip this application. Because you use Budget Plus, you are actively supporting us develop the application further. Thank you!
Please buy us a cup of coffee.

I didn\'t believe it at first, but I\'ve saved more than I ever thought I could. I was at 15% and now I\'m almost to 50%. It\'s only my second month! No more struggling just to save some money. Everything is in control with this feature! It\'s absolutely amazing.

I gave 5 stars for this feature. I tried a lot of apps, but this is exactly what I was looking for. It\'s Beginner friendly. Not just for me, but also for my wife who I have been saving money for retirement together. It was a bit challenging at first but we made it. Hope this review can encourage users like us.

Finally, I can get rid of the uncontrolled spending and stress of thinking about money. I know exactly what I really need to spend and what not to spend. Having Budget Plus helps me organize my money and improves my mood. I upgraded to an annual plan to help further app development.
I\'ve achieved 75% of the average retirement savings goal.
\"Personal finance is 20% knowledge. The other 80% is taking action - Budget Plus can help you fill that gap.\"
Start planning and tracking your expenses by creating a budget.
No transactions available for this budget
You\'ve spent a significant portion of your budget. Consider reducing spending.
You\'ve exceeded your budget limit. Review your spending.
Your budget is expiring soon. Consider creating a new one.
You\'re spending faster than recommended. Slow down to stay within budget.
Notifications when you\'re approaching your budget limit
Notifications when you\'ve exceeded your budget
Notifications when your budget is about to expire
Notifications about your daily spending rate
A budget for this category already exists. Do you want to override it?
Are you sure you want to delete this budget?
You can add budget for each category below
Start saving money by creating budgets and we will help you stick to it
Do you want to delete this budget?
Creating a budget is a key to better expense management.
Do you want to update the time range for all categorized budgets too?
There is only %1$s left in budget %2$s while you\'re trying to add a %3$s budget. You need to choose one action below
Budget %1$s need to be more than %2$s, because total amount of its subbudgets is %3$s.
There is only %1$s left in budget %2$s while you\'re trying to add a %3$s budget.
This month\'s total budget have exceeded your current amount, please adjust your budget accordingly.
Tap the %1$s button above to add new budget
Hooray! Now you can use Budget feature to set up your own spending plan. Complete this challenge within 24 hours!
Otherwise, you can keep 2 of your wallets and archive the rest.
Renew your Money Lover Premium plan to continue using all your wallets.
Couldn\'t connect to the server. Please try again!
Budget support only your active wallets: basic wallet, linked wallet or credit wallet.
You have %1$s budgets can not be displayed.
Still cannot sync? Contact us at contact@moneylover.me
A wallet which you manually input your transactions.
A wallet which automatically synchronizes with your cryptocurrency wallets such as Bitcoin, Ethereum or Litecoin.
A wallet which you can manually note all your savings.
A wallet which automatically synchronizes with your transactions from banks and other services.
Pull down to request an update
Account is connecting, no update needed
Prioritizing monthly expenses are bills or things you need to pay out first each month, such as housing, utilities, food.
Irregular monthly expenses are those that can come out of nowhere or from impulse spending, for example, shampoo, kitchen repairs.
These categories are active in following wallets
Categories of wallet have not been combined
The owner of this wallet has not combined expense categories. The wallet is currently unable to provide any data.
Tap here to manage your categories
This category is active in following wallets
This category and parent category are active in following wallets
Do you want to delete category %1$s?\n%2$s
There are no transactions in this category.

You\'re about to delete category %1$s. %2$s. Please select one action below to process:\n- Merge: move all transactions from this category to another and delete this category\n- Delete: delete this category and its transactions
Do you want to merge category %1$s to %2$s? Category %1$s will be deleted and all its transactions will be moved to category %2$s
Categories with same name are unavailable
The currencies of these wallets are no longer supported. Please update their currencies before continuing.
Are you sure to change the language?
New password must be different from the previous one. Please try again.
Password is incorrect. Please try again.
Slow or no internet connection. Please check your internet settings.
You have reached your maximum device limit. Please remove unused devices.
You can use this account in %d more devices
Cannot get device list at this moment. Please try again later.
Do you really want to remove this device?
For privacy concern, all data associated with this account will be removed from this device and stored safely in the Cloud of your Money Lover account.
This device is now disconnect from Money Lover account
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
You\'re in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Congratulations! You have accomplished your goal.
You can connect to your crypto wallet providers right from inside Money Lover.
Or we can help you create a new one.
Unknown error appeared. Please try again later.
The %1$s budget is %2$s less than the total of individual budgets. Want to increase your %1$s budget?
You\'ve received a gift from Money Lover Team. Tap to download icon package %1$s for free.
Your current subscription plan will be expired soon. Renew now to continue using all the features you love.

You must select time for budget
Ending date must be after starting date

All contributed icons will be free and downloadable from Money Lover store. Users should consider copyright matter before submitting your package. The icons will be accepted under the following circumstances:
 - The icons are originally designed by submitted user.
 - The icons are partially reproduced from other works that are not limited by copyright license.
 - The icons are partially reproduced from other works with written permission from the license owner of the said works.
include:\n— Your name\n— Icon package\'s name
Attach your icon package and send us via email at:
Or open this link on your browser
Add Interest to exactly know total which you must pay
A wallet which you manually arrange your credit card transactions in a simple way and remind you of important due dates.
Crypto wallets currently do not support Reports
before transferring to %1$s. Are you sure?
Adjusting budgets helps you balance over spendings. Therefore, you can still meet your financial goals.
This budget is the budget you just selected.
This is a surplus budget. You can move fund from a surplus budget to a deficit budget to avoid overspending.\nSwipe left to choose another surplus budget.
Fill the amount need to transfer fund
Left action\n- INCREASE spending limit of the above budget.\n- DECREASE speding limit of below budget.
Right action\n- DECREASE spending limit of the above budget.\n- INCREASE speding limit of below budget.
When you create a budget for %1$s and separate budgets for specific expenses, a budget for the remaining categories will be generated. This is called %2$s budget.
You are going through a delete account process.
Please enter your password for verification.
Deleting your account will do the following:
❌ Delete and remove all your data permanently
❌ Won\'t be able to retrieve data
I have many issues when using app
I have a similar app that is more useful
We\'d love to know why you delete your account, so we can improve the app.
Your account is scheduled for permanent deletion
You can cancel deletion by logging in again within %1$s days. After %1$s days, your data will be removed permanently.
Your data is completely safe and secure. Let us know if anything still concerns you.
Are there any other reasons for your decision?
To delete your account and prevent conflicts during the deletion process, you need to remove all members from wallets you shared, and leave all wallets shared to you.
Remove members and leave shared wallets
Account will be completely deleted in %1$s. You can cancel deletion by logging in again within 30 days. After that, you won\'t be able to retrieve your data.
Delete all transactions belonging to other wallets.
Delete all transactions belonging to other wallets and child categories.

The budget has been deleted on another device.

Do you want to delete all?
Do you want to delete this item? \nThis bill will not repeat from now on.
All of these transactions belong to linked wallets or archive wallets so you can\'t delete them.

You will also delete all of its transactions, budgets, events, bills and this action cannot be undone.

Your transactions below may have been duplicated. The list below includes correct and duplicate transactions. Check carefully and click Edit to delete the duplicate transactions!
Select the duplicate transactions and click Delete to remove them. Note that when deleting duplicate transactions, correct transactions in the same group will also be hidden from the list.
You cannot revert these transactions after delete. Are you sure you want to delete?
For each transaction group, we will disable 1 transaction to avoid deleting the correct transactions.

Your transaction history is safe! We don\'t want you to lose your data after updating to the new version of the Free plan, so Premium plan\'s \"Export data feature” is unlocked for you to ensure you still keep your data even if you don\'t upgrade to Premium.

Đối tượng được tính là người phụ thuộc
Thuế thu nhập cá nhân phải đóng

• Con đẻ, con nuôi hợp pháp, con ngoài giá thú, con riêng của vợ, con riêng của chồng, Phát sinh nghĩa vụ nuôi dưỡng từ tháng nào thì được tính từ tháng đó.
 • Vợ hoặc chồng của người nộp thuế.
 • Cha đẻ, mẹ đẻ, cha vợ, mẹ vợ (hoặc cha chồng, mẹ chồng), cha dượng, mẹ kế, cha nuôi, mẹ nuôi hợp pháp của người nộp thuế.
 • Các cá nhân khác không nơi nương tựa mà người nộp thuế đang phải trực tiếp nuôi dưỡng, bao gồm: Anh ruột, chị ruột, em ruột, ông nội, bà nội; ông ngoại, bà ngoại; cô ruột, dì ruột, cậu ruột, chú ruột, bác ruột của người nộp thuế. Cháu ruột của người nộp thuế bao gồm: con của anh ruột, chị ruột, em ruột.
 • Người phải trực tiếp nuôi dưỡng khác theo quy định của pháp luật.

Bills Manager helps you to monitor your repetitive bills such as electricity, rent, Internet subscription, etc. The application will notify you when a bill is due; and therefore you will never forget one again. You can also set the app to remind you in advance.
✅ Notify of remaining amount left, or overspent, if you\'re going to exceed your budget.
You can track your spending by visiting budget detail session.
✅ Budget allows you to divide income into several categories and determine how much you will spend on each for a certain period.
A financial plan to balance your income and expenses.\nBudget only support Basic wallet & Linked wallet.
������\nTake your first step by recording this month\'s salary or lastest purchase.
✅ Event records how much you normally spend on a particular event like vacation or Christmas season. It will be easier to estimate the cost for the next events.
Create an event to track on your spending during an actual event, like traveling at weekend.
✅ When you\'re on an event, turn this mode on so every transaction you record will be added to the event.
By setting up saving and spending plans, you can save more for future.
Knowing how much you spent on a road trip

Report gives an accurate picture of your finances ��
�� Which category did you spend the most on?
�� How much are your monthly fixed expenses?
�� How much can you save after cutting all unnecessary expenses? And so on.
��\nLet\'s record transactions to enable your report. With transactions, report is more useful.
Creating a saving plan is a good way to secure money for future need, or for new stuff.
You can deposit to this plan, or withdraw from it if necessary.\nMoney in saving plan is not counted in balance, so you may not notice its presence thus it will be more secure!

Recording cash flow brings you lots of benefits ��

Take control of your finances with smart budgeting, expense tracking, and personalized insights.
Automatically categorize your spending and see where your money goes in real-time.
Set personalized budgets and get alerts when you’re close to your limits.
Start your journey to financial freedom. Create your main wallet and begin tracking today.
Sign in to sync and back up your data. You can still create a wallet later or skip to enter the app now.
Expense Tracker helps you to keep track of spending money from wallets. Each wallet represents a source of money such as Cash or a Bank Account.
